item.description:
Join us for: Comedy Night at Jimmy's Saloon - July 21, 2011 8:30PM

Comedy starts at 9PM, but arrive at 8:30 to get a seat.

Great Drink Prices - BYOF (Bring your own Food) - I brought popcorn last time : )...

 

Last comedy night they charged $5.00 PP - it was fun and worth it - Fun Night.

Comedy Info: Lisa Landry from Comedy Central making a guest appearance but Orlando Baxter, Marty Caproni and Kelly Morse are all at Jimmy's Thursday Night!!!!!!!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in Comedy area - I will get us a table on the right side - call my cell 401-829-8516 if you don't see us.
item.name: Comedy Night at Jimmy Saloon - July 21, 2011 8:30PM - Fun Night...
